page.title: 12TRANSPORT
page.content: Trains go through Plumpton from Lewes to London,Victoria or London Bridge. There are few trains that stop at Plumpton.They come from the South coast,from Hastings or Eastbourne.They run extra trains on Plumpton race days.The trains are not very plentiful now because local people use their cars to go to work in London,Haywards Heath or Lewes.There are three bus servicesin this area. The Southdown bus only runs on a Friday,and goes from Haywards Heath to Brighton, passing through Plumpton. The Lewes coach company runs every day from Lewes to Haywards Heath.The new bus,is the Village Rider.It runs through Plumpton to East Chiltingtington,but only a few times during the day.It has a special ramp for disabled people.
